name: resthaus
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(co(c0, crest, c1), cha))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(co(c0, crest, c1), cha))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c0, ctop))
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cha), wf1(cres(cid, cin(c1, cuni(c0))), cin(c1, cuni(c0)), cin(c1, cuni(c0))), wcel(cres(cid, cin(c1, cuni(c0))), co(co(c0, crest, c1), ccn, c0))), wcel(co(c0, crest, c1), cha))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(co(c0, crest, c1), cha))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c0, ctop))
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cha), wf1(cres(cid, cin(c1, cuni(c0))), cin(c1, cuni(c0)), cin(c1, cuni(c0))), wcel(cres(cid, cin(c1, cuni(c0))), co(co(c0, crest, c1), ccn, c0))), wcel(co(c0, crest, c1), cha))

|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(co(c0, crest, c1), cha))
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cha), wf1(cres(cid, cin(c1, cuni(c0))), cin(c1, cuni(c0)), cin(c1, cuni(c0))), wcel(cres(cid, cin(c1, cuni(c0))), co(co(c0, crest, c1), ccn, c0))), wcel(co(c0, crest, c1), cha))

stmt.origin: cnhaus(c0, cres(cid, cin(c1, cuni(c0))), cin(c1, cuni(c0)), cin(c1, cuni(c0)), co(c0, crest, c1))

body.origin: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cha), wf1(cres(cid, cin(c1, cuni(c0))), cin(c1, cuni(c0)), cin(c1, cuni(c0))), wcel(cres(cid, cin(c1, cuni(c0))), co(co(c0, crest, c1), ccn, c0))), wcel(co(c0, crest, c1), cha))

cumulated.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(co(c0, crest, c1), cha))

comment: A subspace of a Hausdorff topology is Hausdorff. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Mar-2015.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)
